registration_message: 🌟 Welcome to the new acquaintances application!
request_location_or_city: 🌍 Enter your locality or send a geolocation for automatic detection
enter_birthday_message:
📅 Please, enter your date of birth
  in DD.MM.YYYY format
invalid_birthday_format: ⚠️ The date of birth is incorrect or an unrealistic age is specified
request_photo_message_text:
📸 Please, send your photo
 📎 Click on the paper clip and
 attach your photo
wrong_photo_format:
⚠️ Wrong photo format
 Please, send correct photo
photo_rejected_message:
⚠️ The uploaded photo was rejected
 Please, upload another photo
photo_checking_message: ⌛️ Please wait. Your photo is being checked...
photo_verified_message: ✅ Congratulations! Your photo has been successfully verified
confirm_agreement_message:
📝 By clicking Continue, you confirm
 that you accept the User Agreement and the Privacy
 Policy
main_menu_message: Here you can see 🎯 new candidates, 💘mutual likes or change your profile settings
enter_aboutme_message: ✍️ Write a few lines about yourself
about_me_length_error: ⚠️ The entered text is too long. Please make sure your description contains no more than 1000 characters.
wrong_choise_message: 👆 Select one of the options or click ⬅️ back
wrong_agerange_message: ⚠️ The age range is incorrect. Please enter integers
error_agerange_input_message: An error occurred while processing the entered age range.
set_age_range_message: ⌨️ Send a range of ages (for example: 18-35)
set_prefer_location_message: 🗺️ Enter the city to search for couples
candidate_not_found_message: 😔🔍 Unfortunately, at the moment, we cannot provide suitable candidates according to your preferences. Please review the search parameters, such as age or region, and try again.
no_likes_you_profiles_message: 💔 Sorry, but there are currently no profiles that have liked you. Keep swiping and you may find a match soon!
